Answer.723457: this is a really tough thing to overcome , and i understand it well . the first thing i would do to approach this issue is check the notification settings in each app you post on . a lot of apps nowadays are making more specific , separate notification sliders for interaction types . if you see any notification sliders for likes , turn them off . this will help keep you from coming back to check and obsess every time you might get one . coupled with this , you have to force yourself to do the hardest and i know , it sounds most obvious thing don t bother checking back on your posts . if you re doing things that make you happy , just keep looking forward onto the next thing to post ! and then the next . just don t keep turning back , because you can end up over analyzing and over criticizing yourself . every time you get the urge to check , practice mindfulness and awareness . tell yourself , this is an urge coming from the self conscious part of my mind , and i won t get better if i keep entertaining it . set your phone down and carry on with your day . you deserve better from yourself than to keep yourself spiraling down that stressful , anxious path !
